name: Paw Puppy Hill Moto Racing
description:
Paw Puppy Hill Moto Racing is a fun and exciting racing game. This game is made especially for those who love to Race. In this Game you can choose 7 different puppy moto racer characters. You can also control the paw moto with simple controls making it easy to play.

Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your moto with just one finger and see how it flips. This is what you were looking for! Fast, simple and exciting paw moto hill racing!

Features:

• High Graphics Quality!
• Easy controls just tap and tap
• many different racetracks
• Fun game play, Cute animal racer
• Many different vehicles with unique upgrades
